presentation.title: Presentation
presentation.presentation_description: As a Full Stack Developer passionate about technological innovation, I am currently working as an apprentice at Netim where I develop robust web solutions for people looking to start selling domain names. With strong experience in PHP and other modern technologies, I continuously invest myself in challenging projects that allow me to enhance my skills. My journey at ESGI in Web Engineering enables me to combine theory and practice to create efficient and scalable applications.

posts.title: Posts
posts.description: Here are some articles I wrote on various topics. I hope you enjoy reading them!
posts.no_posts: No articles have been published yet.

timeline.title: Timeline
timeline.timeline_description: Here is an overview of my professional career and studies.

content.1: Development of a showcase website using WordPress
content.2: Development of a statistics website using PHP and MySQL
Maintaining various showcase and e-commerce websites
content.3: Development of automation software with UI using Python

content.1: Development of applications and software solutions
